attributes.action: A petition to remove the UAE off the red list
attributes.additional_details: As a British National living and working in Dubai for a British company we have been heavily effected by these restrictions both financially and personally. We have not seen our families for a long time and are not able to afford the hotel quarantine. It also seems unfair that the government will allow thousands of football VIPs to attend the Euro 2020 finals without quarantine! We demand to be removed from the Red list immediately as this is really affecting us!
attributes.background: To remove the UAE off the red list to enable us British nationals and UAE residents to travel to the UK without hotel quarantine

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575787
